title: Relationships: Regret or Relief?
description:
Jillian and Giancarlo discuss how the end of their marriages ultimately led to far better relationships with their exes. Plus, maximizing micro workouts, and modifying your workout to accommodate injury.


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ
